thread.title: Faith Dingle set to seduce Zak in Emmerdale? | Metro News
thread.title_full: Faith Dingle set to seduce Zak in Emmerdale? | Metro News

author: Duncan Lindsay For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Faith Dingle set to seduce Zak in Emmerdale? | Metro News
text:
Duncan Lindsay for Metro.co.uk Saturday 11 Feb 2017 11:58 pm (Picture: ITV) 
When it comes to monogamy, Zak Dingle has had wavering morals in the past with his affair with Joanie destroying his marriage to Lisa, something which he is desperate to get back on track right now in Emmerdale. 
But could the arrival of Faith be the final nail in Zak and Lisa’s coffin? Given that Zak has once had an affair with Faith, who was with his brother Shadrach at the time (and thus Cain was born), could he be tempted by her once more? 
Lisa is more than uncomfortable with having Faith on the seen and when she starts flirting up a storm with Zak, Lisa fears the worst. (Picture: ITV) 
As Lisa confides in Belle that she thinks Zak might be having an affair, mischievous Faith enjoys playing on Lisa’s paranoia and plays up to it. 
At Lisa’s birthday, things come to a head when Lisa overhears comments made by Faith to Zak and takes them as a play for her husband. But as a showdown explodes, has Lisa gotten the wrong end of the stick? 
Or is she right to worry that Zak might be interested in pursuing a romance with Faith? 
One to watch: Thursday 16th February at 7pm on ITV.
